title: An old image is being shared as ‘COVID-19 infected woman hugged her child for the last time before death’
subtitle: The image is an old one and is not related to any recent incident. It was found to exist on the internet at least since 1997.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image of a woman with protective covering hugging a child is being shared on social media. The claim is that the woman is a critically-ill COVID-19 patient in Italy, and when she told the doctors of her final wish to hug her crying child, the doctors put a protective covering on her entire body and placed the child on her chest. Then the child at once stopped crying and the woman left the world. ‘FACTLY’ has found the image to be old and not related to any recent incident. The image was found to exist on the internet at least since 1997. So, an old image is being shared in the context of COVID-19 outbreak.
